entry.def: The immediacy of an event or situation is the quality that it has which makes it seem important or exciting because it is happening at the present time.

example.ex: Do they understand the immediacy of the crisis?...
example.tran: 他们明白危机的紧迫性吗？

example.ex: The books that result have intensity and a fascinating immediacy, far beyond that of ordinary narrative.
example.tran: 结果写出来的书情节紧张，矛盾冲突强烈,令人欲罢不能,效果与使用普通的叙事手法大为不同。

means.word_mean: 1. lack of an intervening or mediating agency;
3. the quickness of action or occurrence;
